reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's style, noting it looks expensive for the price and has a feminine touch.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Comfy, and Perfect for Fall
items.body: This short-sleeve sweater top is such a great find! It’s soft, breathable, and perfectly comfortable — just the right thickness for the fall season. It’s not too heavy, not too thin, and stretches nicely when putting it on without losing its shape. The fit is flattering and not too tight, and the neck area fits comfortably without feeling restrictive. I also love that it’s non-itchy and the price is excellent for the quality. The only small downside is that I wish the sleeves were just a bit longer, but it’s definitely not a dealbreaker. Overall, it’s a cozy, well-made top that feels great on the skin and looks effortlessly stylish. I’d happily buy it again in another color! Read more
items.author: Cynthia A

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and stylish
items.body: This is a really nice sweater. It can be worn with jeans for a casual look or dressed up with a skirt or slacks. It is versatile and fits well, without being too bulky or too clingy. I ordered the beige, not because the color was my first choice, but it was the one on special pricing, so I took a chance on it and was very surprised that it is a very subtle soft pink more than a beige as described. Good value! Read more
items.author: Kat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Fit - Size Up
items.body: I don’t frequently write product reviews, but I wanted to let people know this sweater is worth ordering. It has the appearance of high quality clothing is the cut, vibrant color, and material. I did size up one size after reading the product reviews. I am 5’ 8” tall and weigh 180. I usually wear a Large in this type of sweater but I ordered an XL and it fit me perfectly. I purchased the Kelley Green color and it is beautiful. Read more
items.author: Baller422475

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable, and stylish
items.body: This sweater is extremely comfortable and the color is perfect to match any color of slacks. The puff sleeves are stylish. I am wearing an XL and it fits exactly how I would expect. My only complaint is the fabric can get creases in odd places if it is not dried flat. If dried on a drying rack, the creases will stay visible until its washed again. The creases from shipping looked permanent, but came out after first wash. Read more
items.author: Jagdiego

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect. Can wear casual or dress up as needed.
items.body: Super cute and runs true to size. Perfect thickness (not thin or too hot) for cool(ish) weather in Florida. Read more
items.author: Paula

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up if you have a larger chest
items.body: For reference, I'm a size L and got a size L which fit slightly snug for being a sweater (you can see my under shirt outline through the sweater. However, this might be because I have a larger chest, so my fellow large chested ladies, take note to perhaps size up. I'm 5'5" and the sweater sat right between my waist and hip. The sleeves are adorable and puff out just right. The arm cuffs were comfortable and not tight around my thick arms. I paired it with jeans, just like in the picture and it looked cute! Read more
items.author: tobri

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute top, poor packaging.
items.body: The sweater itself is really cute — the puff sleeves and overall style are flattering, and the material feels soft and comfortable. However, it arrived in a very tight vacuum-sealed bag, which left noticeable crease lines on the fabric that didn’t fully come out even after washing and steaming. I love the design, but I’d suggest better packaging to avoid damaging the texture of the sweater. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars adorable and worth it in every way
items.body: Adorable on, super warm, quality and thick. looks so much higher quality then the price reflects. Fits true to size I would recommend. Want to get in more colors! Read more
items.author: Abhosk

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, A-white, A-mint Green, Bright Pink, A-black, A-khaki, A-burgundy, A-lilac, A-green, A-army Green, A-beige, A-cream, A-tender Green, A-brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
